testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.content: This course completely transformed my career! I went from doing manual data entry to building AI workflows that save my company 20 hours per week. The n8n automation skills alone got me a promotion.

testimonials.name: Rohit Gupta

testimonials.name: Anjali Patel

testimonials.name: Vikram Singh

testimonials.name: Sneha Reddy

faq.question: Do I need any prior experience with AI or programming?
faq.answer: Not at all! This course is designed for complete beginners. We start from the basics and guide you step-by-step through every concept. No coding or technical background required.

faq.question: How much time do I need to dedicate daily?
faq.answer: The course is designed to be completed in 30 days with just 1-2 hours of daily commitment. You can go at your own pace - some students finish faster, others take a bit longer.

faq.question: What if I can't complete the course in 30 days?
faq.answer: No worries! You get lifetime access to all course materials. You can take as much time as you need and revisit any section whenever you want.

faq.question: Do I get access to the AI tools mentioned in the course?
faq.answer: The course teaches you how to use various AI tools. Some tools offer free tiers, while others may require separate subscriptions. We provide guidance on getting the best deals and free alternatives.

faq.question: Is the referral program really unlimited?
faq.answer: Yes! There are absolutely no limits on how many people you can refer. You earn ₹300 for every successful enrollment through your unique link, and we provide you with marketing materials to help you succeed.

faq.question: Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied?
faq.answer: We're confident you'll love the course, but if you're not completely satisfied within the first 7 days, we offer a full money-back guarantee, no questions asked.

faq.question: Will I be able to get a job after completing this course?
faq.answer: This course teaches highly in-demand skills. Many students have landed better jobs, freelance projects, or started their own AI consulting businesses. We also provide guidance on showcasing your new skills to employers.

faq.question: Are the bonuses really worth ₹15,000?
faq.answer: Absolutely! The AI Starter Kit alone contains premium tools and resources that would cost thousands. The lifetime community access and exclusive events provide ongoing value that far exceeds the bonus valuation.

faq.question: How is this different from free AI tutorials on YouTube?
faq.answer: While free content exists, this course provides a structured, comprehensive learning path with practical projects, community support, and proven frameworks. You get a complete system, not just scattered information.

faq.question: Will the course content become outdated quickly?
faq.answer: We focus on fundamental principles and widely-adopted tools that have staying power. Plus, as a lifetime member, you'll receive updates when new important AI developments emerge.
